Distributions#

Automatically generated#

P-boxes based generated from scipy.stats distributions.

These p-boxes are generated using the scipy.stats distributions. The p-boxes are generated by taking the minimum and maximum values of the inverse CDF of the distribution for a given set of parameters.

The p-boxes are generated using the following function
pba.pbox_constructors.parametric.alpha(*args, steps=200, support=Interval[0.0001, 0.9999], **kwargs) → Pbox#
pba.pbox_constructors.parametric.anglit(*args, steps=200, support=Interval[0.0001, 0.9999], **kwargs) → Pbox#
pba.pbox_constructors.parametric.arcsine(*args, steps=200, support=Interval[0.0001, 0.9999], **kwargs) → Pbox#
